Key Match Events: Kiké Hernández hit a solo home run in the 2nd inning
Teoscar Hernández hit a home run in the 7th inning
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was watched on Saturday morning in Japan
The Dodgers won a decisive Game 5 at home for the first time since taking a 1981 NL Division Series against Houston after a season split into halves following a players’ strike
Others: The Dodgers will play the wild-card New York Mets in the best-of-seven NLCS starting Sunday in Los Angeles
The Padres’ big hitters went bust with their season on the line
The Dodgers staved off elimination in San Diego with an 8-0 victory in Game 4 to force the deciding game back home
